about_the_game:
The city is your orchestra, you are the conductor, how should this rhapsody play?

Welcome to City Rhapsody! Instead of layers and layers of bureaucracy; we, the citizens, decided to appoint one person, you, as the city's "conductor."
Look out! We are very needy so it just may get chaotic. From everyday traffic congestion, changing power demand, accommodating our requests, and providing uninterrupted city services; to fighting out-of-control fires that threaten to wipe us out. Are you ready to take up the challenge?

City Rhapsody! is a low-poly, chill, sophisticated, and engaging city-building game with a twist of real-time strategy mechanics. The player plays the city's all-seeing "conductor" who gets to build all roads and buildings, tweak traffic configurations, open/close businesses, manage complex utility infrastructure, and command special city units. Use them creatively to solve citizens' problems.


⛰️With a fully procedurally generated, dynamic, and evolving world, choose the ideal location to start building your dream city.
  • 3 map sizes, 128x128, 256x256, and 512x512 with realistic tree-growth simulation.
  • Gain more citizens to build larger construction projects.
  • Modern, hand-crafted, low-poly style building models and structures.
  • A unique hybrid grid system that neatly stacks your buildings and roads while not sacrificing variabilities.


🛠️Control buildings and fine-tune the city's operations to make sure your city has enough money to grow.
  • Realistic utility simulation.
  • Full data visualization maps that help you manage your city.


😉Use everything at your disposal creatively to solve challenges and make citizens happy. Remember, unhappy citizens dodge taxes and will leave your city with abandoned buildings that make it unattractive.
  • In-depth traffic simulation with player-customizable roads/intersections.
  • Individually simulated complex citizen AI.
  • Situational generated challenges that are unique to every city.


🚒The world is not all roses. In emergency situations, take over commanding the first responders to save your city from disaster.
  • Realistically simulated forest fire with wind effects.
  • Player-controllable special units to change the outcome of a disaster.

short_description: A modern, low-poly, sophisticated city-builder where you get to control (well, almost) everything. Build your dream city. Attract citizens to stay and grow your city with large construction projects. Use everything under your control, from tax rates to fire trucks, to solve your city's problems.
